column4: help: my window borders are gone (after open arena crushed and i restarted the computer)
oh, and the gnome terminal doesn't work (gnome terminal)
like you don't see the x or the title bar?
it happened after you ran compiz -replace right?
let me try my pidgin exec plugin
i think metacity --replace will get your borders back, but shut down the windows effects
a bit off-topic, is there a way to start a program from the terminal (i. e., just start it, and get the prompt back as soon as the program has started)
you can run a command in the background like this example: ls -l /home/user &
ending the command with the ampersand runs it in the background, but it can sometimes be wierd
